Documentation
Contact
Download
Home
democles
Content
The DEMOS tool originated in the context of two research projects (FACTORS and DASCOM)
dealing with software complexity. The DEMOS tool is based on a new declarative model –
the EP-model – that possesses the following features: it has a small metamodel; it supports
a graphical notation; finally, it allows executable models to be described by annotating
model elements with code snippets. By leaving complex parts at the code level this hybrid
approach achieves executability while keeping the basic modeling language simple.
Learn More...
(c) 2003-2008 DASCOM Project at University of Luxembourg

2. Download/Install
3. Try the Tutorial

approach achieves executability while keeping the basic modeling language simple.
